extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of Level 3 or above in a GNDS Major or Medial or SXGD plan or permission of the department.

basic.description: A seminar in which students work in and outside the classroom on community organizing projects. Students reflect on how feminist, anti-racist, and queer theory can be integrated with real world practices.
basic.subject: GNDS
basic.title: Social Justice Practicum: Learning through Community Organizing and Activism
